Package farm

Class Farm

java.lang.Object
farm.Farm
public class Farm
extends java.lang.Object
This class implements the methods for the Farm in the farm simulator.
Version:
22 May 2020.
Author:
Hayley Krippner, Michelle Muchemwa

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors 
    Constructor Description
    Farm()
    This creates the farm constructor
    Farm​(java.lang.String farmName, int gameDuration, int farmType, double farmMoney, double cropBonus, double happinessBonus, double animalFeedBonus)
    This method creates a Farm.

  • Method Summary

  • Constructor Details

    • Farm

      public Farm()
      This creates the farm constructor

    • Farm

      public Farm​(java.lang.String farmName, int gameDuration, int farmType, double farmMoney, double cropBonus, double happinessBonus, double animalFeedBonus)
      This method creates a Farm. The current day is initialised to day 1. The number of daily actions is initialised to 2. The Farm begins with $0 total profit. The farm type perk is applied.
      Parameters:
      farmName - The name of the Farm
      gameDuration - The duration of the game
      farmType - The type of Farm
      farmMoney - The money of the Farm
      cropBonus - The Crop bonus
      happinessBonus - Whether the Farm has Animal happiness bonus
      animalFeedBonus - The Animal Feed bonus applied in the generalStore

    • cleanLand

      public void cleanLand()
      This method cleans the land in the farm simulator. This increases the farm money.

    • calculateTotalProfit

      public void calculateTotalProfit()
      This method calculates the total profit at the end of the game. This is based on the starting money and finishing money.

    • getTotalProfit

      public double getTotalProfit()

    • calculateFinalScore

      public void calculateFinalScore()
      This method calculates the final score at the end of the game. This is the sum of all inventory items multiplied by the game duration plus the total profit.

    • getFinalScore

      public double getFinalScore()

      This method displays Farm name, game duration, total profit and final score.
